baseRobot.productDescription: The autonomous seeding & weeding robot for precision farming

pfw.name: Passive Front Wheel
pfw.subtitle: Best for flat fields with wider row spacing (45-50 cm)
pfw.description: The standard wheel configuration provides stability and smooth guidance on flat terrain. Ideal for crops with even row counts and wider row spacing, such as sugar beets (45-50 cm).

afw.name: Active Front Wheel
afw.subtitle: Auto-tilting stability for slopes above 8%
afw.description: For hilly terrains, the Active Front Wheel adds an actuator that automatically tilts the front wheel to maintain stability. Recommended for slopes above 8% and side inclines over 5%, and for crops with even row numbers and wider spacing (around 45-50 cm).

dfw.name: Dual Front Wheel
dfw.subtitle: Narrow row spacing down to 22.5 cm & bed systems
dfw.description: Equipped with two front wheels instead of one, this setup enhances balance and precision, particularly for crops with narrow row spacing down to 22.5 cm. Perfect for flat fields and bed systems, works well with both even and uneven row counts.

infoPanel.title: Wheel Configurations
infoPanel.intro: Every field is different, and so is every FarmDroid. The FD20 can be tailored to your specific conditions with adjustable wheel distances, row numbers, and a choice of three front wheel configurations.
infoPanel.adjustmentRange: Your ideal setup depends on several parameters, including crop type, row spacing, soil conditions, and the slope of your field. The FD20's dual back wheels can be adjusted between 160-230 cm in 10 cm increments.
infoPanel.footer: With these configuration options, you can fine-tune your FarmDroid to match your terrain, crops, and working style. Our robot specialists are always ready to help you design the setup that fits your farm best.

selectionInfo.dfw: 4-wheel configuration provides maximum stability. All wheels run outside the rows, ideal for bed cultivation.
selectionInfo.afw: Active front wheel provides better traction in soft soil conditions while maintaining open field capability.
selectionInfo.pfw: Passive front wheel runs between rows, allowing for wider working width in open field cultivation.

info.hybrid: Hybrid configuration adds generator backup for maximum uptime in all conditions.
info.powerBank: Extended electric operation with double battery capacity - stays fully emission-free.
info.solar: Pure solar power provides clean, quiet operation ideal for most farming conditions.

combiTool.name: + Combi Tool
combiTool.description: Multi-purpose tool attachment for enhanced weeding

info.both: Full weeding setup with mechanical tools and precision spraying for maximum weed control.
info.sprayOnly: The +SPRAY system enables targeted herbicide application with GPS precision, reducing chemical usage by up to 90%.
info.combiOnly: Enhanced mechanical weeding with Combi Tool attachments for improved soil management and weed control.
info.standard: Standard mechanical weeding configuration, perfect for organic certification requirements.
